# @beep-it/cli â€” LLM Guide

Purpose: Command-line tooling to scaffold and integrate BEEP components (MCP servers, examples).

Install
```bash
npm install -g @beep-it/cli
```

Capabilities
- Scaffold MCP server templates
- Generate example integrations
- Helper tasks for local development

Docs: README.md in this package
Last updated: 2025-09-17
